amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas Program by $8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas Program by $8 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hooley amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 348 - 76 (Roll no. 273).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Hooley.
